changes.reason: Expanded incomplete CLI command syntax from 'configure interface port ()' to full syntax; clarified link_state_trap obsolescence note
Removed added guidance 'When true, the interface/feature is enabled; when false, it is disabled' which was not in help.txt
Cleaned up formatting; separated obsolescence note from main description to match help.txt structure
Removed added guidance 'When enabled, SNMP traps will be generated for state changes' which was not in help.txt
Cleaned up description; separated format details and removed redundant 'Maximum length' line already implicit in help.txt
Reformatted to match help.txt; removed added guidance 'Alarms below this threshold will not be reported' and cleaned up default value presentation
Removed garbage text 'DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#' and reformatted description to match help.txt

example_data_source: Captured from live Nokia ISAM device DS-LIN-TEST-01. All parameter values and resource identifiers are from actual device output. Examples demonstrate realistic before/after states using help.txt parameter definitions.
notes: All corrections strictly derived from device help.txt. Removed vendor-added guidance. Examples use real device resources (port 1/1/2 from available ports on device). Parameter choices and defaults verified against live device documentation.
